channel.title: Theft, robbery, etc
channel.description: It's becoming insane the amount of robbery that's happening. I've been robbed twice in the last week. I've put my chests in a sealed room, and walled it off from the nearest ext with 4 layers of netherrack. The thief then decided to go around, through the stone and then go at my stuff. Other people's villages are becoming targets, too. Ask piggle. I think it's 2 - 3 times in the last week. Can we put some kind of stop to this?

item.title: Theft, robbery, etc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Show images/proof on the thread.

Read full topic

item.description:
@piggle wrote:

sigh it isint minnamum he broke my glass, my ntherack, and made holes in walls, he made a mess and i want him to pay for it :mad:

item.title: Theft, robbery, etc
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“piggle, post:3, topic:394580”]actually, its that i get robbed about 3 times a week by kraky agl and the rest of the people who like robbing, ,the latest was a guy named jed who came into my town wreaked it and left, i would post the pictures, as i have many but sadly, i do not know how. someone help, these people cause grief and get away with it, type in /rules 1. use commeme sense, i don’t think that breaking holes and destroying houses is, or has ANY sense.
2. be respectful, these people swear, and kill (as kraky invaded and killed me for my items before), and steal, and lie, and break into houses without cleaning up. 4. NO GRIEFING <— its like they havent, or dont know the rules, its sad, anyways, bye for now[/quote]
You have also obviously not read the thread rules. Minimal griefing is allowed when looking for chests around a house. It is also allowed when invading someones house so you can kill them.

Read full topic

actually, its that i get robbed about 3 times a week by kraky agl and the rest of the people who like robbing, ,the latest was a guy named jed who came into my town wreaked it and left, i would post the pictures, as i have many but sadly, i do not know how. someone help, these people cause grief and get away with it, type in /rules 1. use commeme sense, i don’t think that breaking holes and destroying houses is, or has ANY sense.
2. be respectful, these people swear, and kill (as kraky invaded and killed me for my items before), and steal, and lie, and break into houses without cleaning up. 4. NO GRIEFING <— its like they havent, or dont know the rules, its sad, anyways, bye for now

Robbery is not against rules I wish lwc wasn’t limited but moparisthebest wants as close to vanilla as possible so he gave one lock and knowing him I don’t think he’s gonna change and no matter how many layers you put some people use X-ray so they see the chests

It’s becoming insane the amount of robbery that’s happening.
I’ve been robbed twice in the last week.
I’ve put my chests in a sealed room, and walled it off from the nearest ext with 4 layers of netherrack.
The thief then decided to go around, through the stone and then go at my stuff.
Other people’s villages are becoming targets, too. Ask piggle. I think it’s 2 - 3 times in the last week.
Can we put some kind of stop to this?
